title: Become A Miracle | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Become A Miracle | Joel Osteen
description:
When you go out of your way to bless someone else, you are setting your own miracle into motion. Your destiny is linked to helping those around you.


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
